post:
> **[Spry Servers](https://www.spryservers.net)** is a Phoenix, AZ, USA based service provider. With more than 5 years in business, and now two US data center locations (Dallas & Phoenix); we are a fast growing provider of pure SSD shared and reseller hosting, Nextcloud hosting, top-of-the-line dedicated servers, VPS and more. Our services are backed by a 99.9% uptime SLA. We offer a 30 day money back guarantee for most products.

#Phoenix Data Center Grand Opening Sale
In celebration of moving in to our newest [data center](https://www.spryservers.net/phoenix-dc), we're offering a 30% off, recurring discount on VPS (and shared hosting).

**Coupon Code:** PHOENIXSPECIAL (valid thru 01/31/2019)

**Phoenix Test IPs:**
- IPv4: 23.130.97.33
- IPv6: 2602:fe6b:1010:1000::1

_Prices below are after the discount code is applied._

[_**Flex SSD VPS (KVM)**_](https://www.spryservers.net/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=206)
**SSD:** 5 GB (upgrade-able to 1024 GB)
**RAM:** 512 MB (upgrade-able to 16 GB)
**Dedicated Cores:** 1 (upgrade-able to 32)
**Port Speed:** 100 Mbps (upgrade-able to 1 Gbps)
**Bandwidth:** 1000 GB (upgrade-able)
**IPv4:** 1 (up to 8)
**IPv6:** /64 subnet
**Control Panel:** SolusVM
**Monthly:** $3.85 USD

**SSD:** 10 GB

**Monthly:** $4.20 USD
